A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There is so many things wrong in this movie. After The Force Awakens and Roque One my apetite was so big\, but this movie is on 1-3 parts level. SPOILERS!!! Ren kills Snoke without any problems\, Luke dying in the stupiest way\, Rose rescue Finn\, letting New Order to use their weapon and potentially killing all remaining rebels\, and many\, many more. Visualy movie is great\, but the story is just incredibly stupid.
